description:
Protect your bike while out and about. This kit combines the Ultimate 420 U-Lock with a double-ended cable, giving you locking options. Use the U-Lock alone for quick stops and low crime areas. Add the cable to the mix for longer stops or any areas where removable components like wheels, are at higher risk.

  • 13mm hardened shackle
  • 1 x 120cm double looped cable for securing your wheels
  • Soft rubber coating protects your bike’s paint job
  • Includes 2 coded reversible keys
  • Included mount is secure and adjustable
  • Abus security rating: 12/15 and Sold Secure gives it a gold rating (suitable for medium risk areas)
name: Abus Ultimate 420 U-lock + Cable Combo Pack
